WorkItem.Description:
I downloaded the new version and now every time I try to do an upgrade list it freezes at different percentages. For example, it will freeze at 60% and I can not cancel the request or even close rawr unless I restart. 
Not sure if anyone is having the same issues, but if someone knows how to fix it that would be great :D

Comments.Message: Second that. I'm having the same issue as well. Been using Build Upgrade List after every raid where I get a new item, and since updating to Rawr 2.2.5, it completely freezes at a different percent each time.

yea, now its stuck at 0 :(

help!
This is a known issue. If you need to use 2.2.5 then try disabling jewelcrafting gems for optimizer. Otherwise revert to 2.2.4 or wait for 2.2.6.
